total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the rows that are filled with 5s and 0s in the input grid.
Q2: Identify the rows that are filled with 0s in the input grid.
Q3: Replace the 0s in the rows identified in Q1 with 2s.
Q4: Replace the 0s in the rows identified in Q2 with 1s.
Q5: Maintain the pattern of 5s and 2s in the rows identified in Q1.
Q6: Maintain the pattern of 1s and 2s in the rows identified in Q2.

Q4: Replace the 0s in the rows identified in Q2 with 1s, except for the first and last 0s in each row.
Q5: Replace the 0s that are between 2s in the rows identified in Q1 with 2s.
Q6: Replace the 0s in the rows identified in Q2 with 1s, except for the first and last 0s in each row.
